prog: (PARI) a(n)=sumdiv(n, d, moebius(n/d)*binomial(2*d,d)/(d+1)); \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Jun 15 2013(Haskell)a002996 n = sum $ zipWith (*) (map a008683 divs) (map a000108 $ reverse divs)   where divs = a027750_row n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 22 2013
